Sentencas: LSM (La0.85Sr0.15MnO3-delta)-SDC (Sm0.2Ce0.8O1.9) composites, which are based on LSM matrices embedded with SDC particles, were fabricated with an ion-impregnation technique as cathodes for intermediate and low temperature solid oxide fuel cells(SOFCs).
Titulo: Effect of firing temperature on the performance of LSM-SDC cathodes prepared with an ion-impregnation method

Sentencas: Effect of heat-treatment temperatures for both LSM matrices and SDC particles was investigated on cathodic interfacial polarization resistances.
Titulo: Effect of firing temperature on the performance of LSM-SDC cathodes prepared with an ion-impregnation method

Sentencas: When the matrix was fired in the range of 800-1000 degrees C, low temperature resulted in high specific surface area, and therefore low resistance.
Titulo: Effect of firing temperature on the performance of LSM-SDC cathodes prepared with an ion-impregnation method

Sentencas: On the contrary, high temperature enhanced the bonding between the particles and matrices, and consequently caused increased electrochemical performance when the impregnated SDC was heated at temperature from 700 degrees C to 800 degrees C. With the impregnated LSM-SDC composite as the cathode, a single cell generated 138 mW/cm(2) at 600 degrees C when humidified H-2 was used as the fuel, suggesting that it is possible to use LSM as the cathodes for SOFCs that operated at low temperature when the microstructure is further optimized.
Titulo: Effect of firing temperature on the performance of LSM-SDC cathodes prepared with an ion-impregnation method
Effect of firing temperature on the performance of LSM-SDC cathodes prepared with an ion-impregnation method
Effect of firing temperature on the performance of LSM-SDC cathodes prepared with an ion-impregnation method
